benchmark_details.name: MathScape: Benchmarking Multimodal Large Language Models in Real-World Mathematical Contexts
benchmark_details.overview: MathScape is a novel benchmark focused on assessing MLLMsâ€™ reasoning ability in realistic mathematical contexts comprising 1,369 high-quality math problems paired with human-captured real-world images.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To systematically evaluate the mathematical reasoning capabilities of multimodal large language models (MLLMs) in practical settings.

data.source: Real-world math problem photos collected from educational contexts.

methodology.calculation: Performance evaluated based on the correctness of answers to math problems.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better reasoning ability and understanding of math problems in real-world contexts.
methodology.validation: Validation through rigorous checks conducted by expert annotators.
